title: can i use vpn to lower my ping ?
body:
can i use something like wtfast and outfox to lower my ping 
and if i use it will i get banned for it ?

replies.body: Using a VPN isn't something that would actively get you banned.

You are allowed to use these programs. 

I don't quiet see how they would help your ping that much maybe knock about 15-20ms off max. But feel free to try and see, they are perfectly legal to use with league.
